```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(googledrive)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)

## Sets R not to use scientific notations
options(scipen=999) 

```


## Read data
```{r}
excel_sheets(here::here("raw_data/Crab Home Range Locations.xls"))

##Only sheet one has data

crab_home_loc <- read_excel(here::here("raw_data/Crab Home Range Locations.xls")) %>% 
  clean_names()

```

Data is clean. It just needs to be saved into csv format


## Save data
```{r}
write_csv(crab_home_loc, here::here("clean_data/2005_palmyra_atoll_crab_home_range_locations.csv"))
```
